Human Rights Watch head Kenneth Roth said that Obama had clearly sided with democracy but that it was not until Zine El Abidine Ben Ali "was basically out the door" that France took sides. The EU, the US and others learned a lesson, he added. Western nations had long supported the Tunisian leader, seeing him as a bulwark against Islamic militants in the region. who wasn't For six years, Larry Page and Sergey Brin told Eric Schmidt that Google Inc. should build its own browser, and for six years, he resisted. " Google Inc. was a small company," Eric Schmidt remembered. Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again. So Sergey Brin and Page hired some ex-Firefox developers and had them build a prototype. When they showed Eric Schmidt the browser that would be How We Will Take Down Google Inc. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city "rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city."

Mr Eric Schmidt , speaking at the DLD media conference in Munich yesterday, said he expected to spend another 10 years at the company, after his surprise handover last week to co-founder Larry Page. I'm very personally excited about my next decade at Google, said Mr Eric Schmidt , who had previously said that the move was an effort to speed up decision-making. talkback No responses currently. Na 10 jaar onder Eric Schmidt , zou Page zou inmiddels genoeg ervaring hebben om zelf het heft in handen te nemen, laat Eric Schmidt doorschemeren in een blog posting. Eenvoudiger structeren Naarmate Google is gegroeid, is het managen van het bedrijf ingewikkelder geworden. Larry[ Page], Sergey Brin [ Sergey Brin ] en ik hebben een hoop gesproken over hoe de we management structuur eenvoudiger kunnen maken en beslissingen kunnen versnellen. Afgelopen kerst hebben we besloten dat dit het beste moment is om structurele veranderingen aan te brengen. "De afgelopen 10 jaar hebben we allemaal een rol gehad bij het nemen van besluiten.
